opinions.snippet:
Klein, P. J.,
In September 1953 a report was widely circulated in Philadelphia that a group of children, playing in Fairmount Park, had witnessed an apparition of the Virgin Mary in a bush near the corner of Fifty-first Street and Parkside Avenue.
